runs.comm: a big inswinger first up and it hits the pad after Nicol steps forward and tries to push towards mid-on, Kulasekara appeals but Nicol was well forward
full and swinging into the right-hander, Nicol moves forward again and clips through midwicket
good length wider outside off stump, not much inswing on this one, Guptill lets it go
Guptill moves forward to defend the inswinger but doesn't do a clean job, the ball bounces behind him and he turns around to shepherd it past his stumps
worked off the pads towards backward square leg
Nicol comes out of his crease and tries to bash the ball through the off side, doesn't make any contact
length ball outside off stump, the right-hander moves forward and plays towards point
length ball outside off, Guptill has to stay in his crease and open the face of the bat to steer towards third man
Nicol stays on the back foot and pushes a length ball towards mid-off, they begin to run immediately and complete a quick single
Guptill prods at a good length ball that shapes away a little and is beaten outside off stump
once again Guptill gets beaten by the swing away from him, Sangakkara does not collect cleanly
good length and straight, Guptill is behind the line as he defends on the off side
and he's tested immediately because Kulasekara strays down leg side, Nicol misses the pull and Sangakkara lunges to get gloves on the ball and prevent five wides
Nicol tries to whip the ball off the pads but misses, he gets a leg bye towards square leg
fuller ball and Guptill has sent that to the long-on boundary with a clean bat swing, moving forward, getting under the ball and lofting it

dropped, but a tough chance at mid-on. Guptill tried to loft over the infield again but didn't make proper contact, he hit it well enough to force Thisara Perera to leap in order to get hands on the ball over his head. He couldn't hold on
a deft late cut this time, placed fine of the fielder at short third man
defended on the off side
driven to long on for a single, that over's given New Zealand momentum
length ball on the pads, Guptill gets inside the line by moving towards off stump and glances the ball off his pads to the square leg boundary
superb reply, pitches on a good length on off stump and shapes away from Guptill, who fends off the back foot and is beaten
once again the line is a bit straight, Guptill works the ball off his hips towards square leg
the slower ball on a good length, Nicol was out of his crease early and played the ball towards point
another slower ball around off stump, Nicol had come out of his crease again and then had to wait to defend the ball
Nicol moves across his crease to chip a slower ball in the air but past the fielder at short fine leg, New Zealand are getting a move on here
driven to long on for a single, nice and easy to start with
Nicol takes a stride forward and drives to long on as well
floated on of and middle stump, Guptill strides forward and defends back to the bowler
this time he moves forward and drives the ball gently into the gap between extra cover and mid-on, there's time for the second
played to short fine leg and there's no single there, Malinga's throw is poor and he concedes overthrows

short ball outside off stump to end the over, Guptill sends it racing to the point boundary with a cut off the back foot. Not a good start from Mendis, 10 runs off that over. Wonder if he's feeling that side strain.
short of a length outside off, Nicol tries to slap it off the back foot but the fielder at cover is in the way
Nicol tried to turn that on the leg side but was squared up by the slower ball that moved away from him, he got a leading edge that fell safely short of extra cover
short of a length and straight, played from the crease towards midwicket
stand and deliver stuff, Guptill lines up a short of a length ball and tees off on the front foot, hitting the ball over the bowler's head with a horizontal bat
punched off the back foot towards point, the ball is coming on to the bat so well today
Guptill moved forward and towards leg, Malinga followed him, and Guptill clipped the ball between square leg and midwicket
a slower ball bowled full on the pads, played from the crease to deep midwicket

short of a length outside off, Guptill slashes at it and gets a thick outside edge towards third man, Malinga is on the boundary and he runs to his right and misses the ball. The ball spun past him and he was clutching at air. Horribly dozy effort
played on the off side

in the air towards deep square leg where Jeevan Mendis runs forward and to his right and dives to try and catch the ball, it falls just short and he does well to prevent the ball bouncing past him. Nicol had swept firmly
Dilshan makes a sharp save at backward point
full ball outside off stump, Nicol thumps it from his crease and he's hit it hard enough to beat the fielder at long off
not sure what he bowled there, perhaps the offbreak, that was around leg stump and Guptill missed it and was hit on the pad
Guptill steps out of his crease and drives to long off

he's struck! And look at that joy on his face, he's beaming! Guptill came forward again and attacked the bowler, lofting down the ground and straight to the fielder on the long-off boundary, Thisara Perea took a straightforward catch
Nicol pushes on the off side for a single
that might have been a legbreak but it did not turn, McCullum let it go outside off
nudged from the crease towards midwicket
flat ball outside off with some turn, McCullum hits it to cover off the back foot
the legbreak bowled fuller on off stump, McCullum pushes forward to block but gets an inside edge towards square
Nicol was late on playing the googly and thrust his pad outside off stump as he defended awkwardly, Mendis appeals but the impact was outside off stump
played on the leg side
McCullum steps out of his crease and drives to long on
Nicol attacks Jeevan, stepping out of his crease, getting to the pitch of the ball and lofting it over the long-off boundary
that's a full toss, McCullum was very far out of the crease when he swung hard, slicing the ball high in the air and just far enough over long off. That was a legbreak
nudged towards square leg for a single
that's a googly and it zips into Nicol who defends on the back foot
pushed off the back foot towards cover
that's a legbreak and McCullum was charging the bowler to thrash him through the off side, he got an inside edge on the leg side
McCullum moves back this time and cuts the ball from just outside off through point
cut in the air but just short of the fielder at short third man
short ball outside off and McCullum drags it off the back foot to long on
superb shot, Nicol moves forward and swings across the line, slapping the ball into the gap on the midwicket boundary. The ball is doing very little for Ajantha Mendis
another short ball but Nicol misses the pull this time
much slower outside off stump, driven to long off
McCullum slog sweeps and the fielder on the deep midwicket boundary manages to palm the ball to prevent it from going for four

he's dropped the caught and bowled and has been hit on the face by the ball. McCullum, the non-striker, immediately checks on the bowler. Nicol drove the ball hard and flat back at Danajaya. the bowler had his hands up to try and catch it but the ball burst through and smashed into his face. He isn't cut but that would have hurt plenty
full toss which is driven to long on for a single
round the wicket, flatter line on middle and off, McCullum tries to play on the leg side but gets an edge on the off
a full toss, the batsman drives off the front foot towards deep cover
he's smashed it, McCullum charging down the pitch and swinging hard at a full ball outside off stump, slamming it over the long-off boundary
McCullum skips out of his crease again and drives the ball along the ground through cover
Mendis breaks the ball away from the right-hander, McCullum tried to nudge off the back foot and was beaten
caught at deep square leg! McCullum didn't make good contact with the slog sweep, hitting the one that spins away in the air and into Thisara's waiting hands
the googly on off and middle stump, worked off the pads towards square leg
that's the offbreak and Taylor leans across and nudges behind square
Nicol lunges forward and taps the ball gently towards long-on, giving himself enough time to run two
on the pads this time and Nicol nudges towards short fine leg
comes out of his crease to the legspinner and plays through square leg
flat delivery on middle and off, played towards long on for a single
Nicol steps out of his crease to work the ball on the leg side but misses and is hit on the pad
Nicol tries to slog sweep but misses and is hit on the pad again, Mendis is bowling very slowly
defended back to the bowler on the front foot
Taylor pushes the ball off the front foot towards wide long on and has enough time to turn for the second
Nicol gets down on one knee and slog sweeps Ajantha Mendis cleanly over the deep square leg boundary, it was a quicker ball and Nicol played a shot out of his captain's book
and again! Nicol is taking it to Mendis, moving forward, getting down on one knee and slapping the ball from outside off over the wide long-on boundary. That shot brings up his fifty
driven to long off for a single
short ball outside off stump, cut off the back foot past point
a third six! Nicol gets down on one knee and wings hard, lofting the ball high over cow corner, 20 runs off the over already
Mendis seems to have been rattled, bowling very wide outside off stump, Sangakkara does well to get a glove on the ball
nudged off the pads towards mid-on, the fielder had to run in from the deep so there was time for the second, 24 runs off that over
Nicol moves forward and drives a full toss to long off
another full toss outside off, Nicol leans towards the off side and paddles towards fine leg
Nicol moves towards the off to slog sweep but misses and is hit on the pad, that pitched outside leg stump

he has his second wicket! Nicol attempted to clear the deep midwicket boundary by trying to slog sweep but got a top edge, hitting the ball high in the air and not far enough. Thirimanne settled under the catch
Taylor moves forward and towards the off side to work the ball through midwicket, they attempt a risky second
a full toss and Taylor delicately paddles it past Ajantha Mendis at short fine leg, he's probably saving his big hits for the later overs
full ball on off stump, Oram drives to Mahela at cover and sets off, Taylor sends him back but Mahela's throw misses the stumps. There was no run there
Oram stays in his crease and drives a little squarer, between point and cover
full and straight, played to the fielder at deep square leg, hit all along the ground
full ball around off stump, Oram stays back in his crease and drives through cover
too full and too much on leg stump, Taylor glances the ball off the pads with almost no backlift, using the pace to find the fine leg boundary

there's an awful mix-up and the fielding is poor too. Taylor played the ball straight to Mahela at midwicket and ran. Mahela threw the ball too high to Malinga, who failed to catch the ball to run out the batsman. Mahela should have gone for the direct hit, Malinga wasn't in the best position
the slower ball but it is down leg side, too far away to for Taylor to connect with the slog sweep
the yorker outside off stump, Taylor jams his bat down on it and squeezes it to the third man boundary

bowled him with the slower ball! Taylor had finished swinging across the line by the time the ball reached him. He was on the front foot and played much too early, Kulasekara hit leg stump. That slower ball was out of the back of the hand
a slower full toss, McCullum plays the ball through midwicket
Oram swings hard at a low full toss, slicing the ball high over the bowler's head towards the boundary. Thisara Perera ran from long on and dived but couldn't reach the ball
hit hard along the ground to midwicket
caught at long off! Oram came out of his crease, made room and hammered the length ball flat and hard towards Dilshan, who moved to his right, got his body behind the ball and caught it nicely
in the blockhole, and the batsman works the ball through square leg
a low full toss outside off stump, Frannklin taps the ball towards extra cover for a single
another low full toss, on a straighter line, McCullum drive to long on
in the blockhole once again, Franklin squeezes it out towards the bowler's left and Malinga fumbles to allow the single
that's too wide outside off stump, a wide even though McCullum had backed away towards leg
bowled him, I think off the inside edge, on to the pad, and on to the base of leg stump. McCullum backed away towards leg to make room and swung hard, he was beaten by the yorker
Williamson makes room by moving toward leg and then manages to squirt a full ball on middle stump towards point, Dilshan fumbles
a slower ball, which Williamson edges on to his pad after charging down the pitch and having a swing
a rubbish full toss and Franklin has swung hard enough to send the ball over the bowler's head for a one-bounce four
a full ball in the blockhole, Franklin plays it towards the bowler's left and Kulasekara gets a hand on it but doesn't field cleanly enough to stop the single
played off the pads to square leg
a low full toss and Franklin swats it to midwicket for just the single
in the blockhole outside off stump, Williamson drives the ball towards deep point but gets run out while attempting a desperate second. Sangakkara had plenty of time to remove the bails
